page.title: Sightings by UN patrols bolster suspicions of Rwandan incursion in Congo (Canadian Press)
page.text: Canadian Press - KINSHASA, Congo (AP) - UN air and ground patrols have photographed freshly occupied encampments and unidentified well-equipped troops in east Congo, UN officials said Thursday, bolstering suspicions that Rwanda is making good on its threat to send troops into its larger, weaker neighbour.
